posts.title: La hobby y el ZELDA.....pues va a ser que si jugaron xD
posts.content:
Did someone already mention the "ganado" thing? They say there's a quest where you take care of a "ganado" (one of those cows I guess). It seems like there's going to be a lot of sidequests and little missions to do for NPCs. Taking care of cows, looking for cats, sounds like fun.

El ganado les trae de cabeza X-DX-DX-D
